title: Luke James: Not 'Chi' About Singing
description: Grammy-nominated singer-songwriter Luke James chats about working with Beyoncé and Prince, acting on the series The Chi, and sings-along to some classic steamy slow jams. Plus, an audio quiz where contestants must identify famous robots in pop culture. Bleep-bloop!

itunes:title: Luke James: Not 'Chi' About Singing
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Luke James sings-along to some classic steamy slow jams in a game called "Tunnel of Love."
